border: 0px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, &quot;Century Gothic&quot;, PingHei, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 22px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;">&nbsp; &nbsp; 译者序，ELK平台是指基于&nbsp;Elasticsearch、 Logstash和&nbsp;Kibana的日志分析平台。通过 Elasticsearch强大的文档搜索能力对日志进行分析并通过 Kibana以可视化的方式展示。本文译自 DigitalOcean上的文章：<a href="https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/how-to-install-elasticsearch-logstash-and-kibana-elk-stack-on-ubuntu-14-04" target="_blank" style="box-sizing: inherit; border-left-color: initial; border-image: initial; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, &quot;Century Gothic&quot;, PingHei, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 22px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-decoration: none;">How To Install Elasticsearch, Logstash, and Kibana (ELK Stack) on Ubuntu 14.04</a>&nbsp;。</p></blockquote><h2 style="box-sizing: inherit; border: 0px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, &quot;Century Gothic&quot;, PingHei, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 3.2rem; font-style: inherit; font-weight: 700; margin: 2em 0px 1em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; clear: both;">简介</h2><p style="box-sizing: inherit; border: 0px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, &quot;Century Gothic&quot;, PingHei, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 19px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px 0px 1.6842em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;">在本文中，我们将会完整的完成一次ELK平台的部署，包括Elasticsearch 2.2.x、Logstash 2.2.x和Kibana 4.4.x，以及对它们的配置。同时也将展示给大家如何通过Filebeat 1.1.x对日志进行收集和将系统日志可视化。Logstash是一个开源的日志收集分析存储工具；Kibana是一个用于展示日志分析结果和日志内容搜索的Web前端界面。他们都基于Elasticsearch所提供的服务。</p><p style="box-sizing: inherit; border: 0px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, &quot;Century Gothic&quot;, PingHei, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 19px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px 0px 1.6842em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;">日志集中管理有助于尽早的发现服务器/应用可能存在的问题，因为这样做将能够在一处管理所有的日志而无需查看各个服务器/应用状态。同时这也有助于发现可能存在的多服务器共同存在的问题。</p><p style="box-sizing: inherit; border: 0px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, &quot;Century Gothic&quot;, PingHei, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 19px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px 0px 1.6842em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;">当然，可以用Logstash去收集各种类型的日志进行分析，但是作为基础的教程，在本文中将只使用系统日志(syslog)这一个部分的日志作介绍。</p><h2 style="box-sizing: inherit; border: 0px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, &quot;Century Gothic&quot;, PingHei, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 3.2rem; font-style: inherit; font-weight: 700; margin: 2em 0px 1em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; clear: both;">目标</h2><p style="box-sizing: inherit; border: 0px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, &quot;Century Gothic&quot;, PingHei, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 19px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px 0px 1.6842em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;">此教程的目标是部署Logstash对多台服务器的系统日志进行分析并部署Kibana将这些数据可视化。</p><p style="box-sizing: inherit; border: 0px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, &quot;Century Gothic&quot;, PingHei, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 19px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px 0px 1.6842em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;">我们的ELK平台部署主要包含以下四个部分：</p><ul style="box-sizing: inherit; border: 0px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, &quot;Century Gothic&quot;, PingHei, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 19px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px 0px 1.6842em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; list-style: disc;"><li style="box-sizing: inherit; border: 0px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, &quot;Century Gothic&quot;, PingHei, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 19px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;">Logstash：部署在服务器端(Server)用于处理来自客户端(Client)的日志</li><li style="box-sizing: inherit; border: 0px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, &quot;Century Gothic&quot;, PingHei, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 19px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;">Elasticsearch：存储所有的日志为分析做准备</li><li style="box-sizing: inherit; border: 0px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, &quot;Century Gothic&quot;, PingHei, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 19px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;">Kibana：用于数据可视化和搜索的Web界面。使用Nginx代理。</li><li style="box-sizing: inherit; border: 0px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, &quot;Century Gothic&quot;, PingHei, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 19px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;">Filebeat：在客户端安装，用于将日志文件传送给服务器端。Filebeat提供了一个可以与Logstash进行交互的日志传送接口。</li></ul><p style="box-sizing: inherit; border: 0px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, &quot;Century Gothic&quot;, PingHei, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 19px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px 0px 1.6842em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;"><img src="./Evernote网页版_files/elk-infrastructure.png" alt="elk-infrastructure" width="970" height="279" style="box-sizing: inherit; border: 0px; height: auto; max-width: 100%; vertical-align: middle;"></p><p style="box-sizing: inherit; border: 0px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, &quot;Century Gothic&quot;, PingHei, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 19px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px 0px 1.6842em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;">我们将在服务器端先安装三个主要组件，即ELK平台。之后，将在各个客户端安装Filebeat以用于将日志传送给服务器端。</p><h2 style="box-sizing: inherit; border: 0px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, &quot;Century Gothic&quot;, PingHei, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 3.2rem; font-style: inherit; font-weight: 700; margin: 2em 0px 1em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; clear: both;">前期准备</h2><p style="box-sizing: inherit; border: 0px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, &quot;Century Gothic&quot;, PingHei, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 19px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px 0px 1.6842em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;">为了完成这个教程，你需要拥有一台VPS(有root权限)。VPS需求的配置取决于你需要处理的日志量。本文使用的配置如下：</p><ul style="box-sizing: inherit; border: 0px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, &quot;Century Gothic&quot;, PingHei, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 19px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-size: 19px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;">RAM：4GB</li><li style="box-sizing: inherit; border: 0px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, &quot;Century Gothic&quot;, PingHei, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 19px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px 0px 1.6842em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;">另外还需要一些客户端机器用于收集日志。</p><p style="box-sizing: inherit; border: 0px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, &quot;Century Gothic&quot;, PingHei, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 19px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px 0px 1.6842em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;">下面就让我们开始部署我们的ELK服务器吧！</p><h2 style="box-sizing: inherit; border: 0px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, &quot;Century Gothic&quot;, PingHei, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif;
